channel.title: Combined Politepol Feed
channel.description: Merged feed from multiple Politepol sources

item.title: 15 killed in Sydney Bondi Beach shooting during Hanukkah celebrations. What we know about Jewish festival
H-1B visas are being ‘prudentially revoked’: What does this mean for Indians?
Why are mass shootings so rare in Australia despite the Bondi attack? Gun laws, explained
Who is Ahmed Al Ahmed? The story of Australia’s hero who disarmed Bondi Beach shooter
History Today: The day America ended the Iraq War
Bondi Beach shooting: How Australia’s deadliest terror attack in decades unfolded in 6 minutes
How ex-ISI chief Faiz Hameed’s fall could unravel Pakistani military elite
item.description: Those who live by the sword tend to die by it. With segments of the army facing stalled promotions while fighting terrorists daily, Munir’s future may itself be precarious

item.title: India’s Link West policy: PM Modi’s upcoming Jordan, Ethiopia, and Oman visit
item.description: Prime Minister Modi's forthcoming visits to Jordan, Ethiopia and Oman are important for a variety of strategic, economic, and diplomatic reasons and are aimed at advancing India's national interests and enhancing its global standing

item.title: How Trump’s recalibration of US-China ties will affect India
item.description: The US’ new security strategy is unsurprisingly reflective of President Trump’s personality. It is inward-looking and geopolitically transactional, where it lays the national economic strategy as primary and being the ‘leader of the free world’ as secondary

item.title: From Deepam to dissent: Why Congress has an inherited fear of an independent judiciary
item.description: The Karthigai Deepam saga is only the latest reminder of the grand old party’s long history of discomfort with independent judges and constitutional limits

item.title: Why it's time for US to revise its Nato commitment
item.description: The US, whose main adversary is China, not Russia, backs a military alliance that has endangered Europe by prolonging the Ukraine War by obstructing peace efforts

item.title: Java’s Borobudur temple showcases the volcano-island’s Hindu-Buddhist heritage
item.description: Borobudur’s significance declined sharply, not only from volcanic damage but also due to the fall of its patron dynasty and the local population’s conversion to Islam
